Title: The Nokhud Offensive: The Wind Belongs to the Sky
Description:
Is this the end of your time with us, $n, or will you aid us once again?

My scouts report that Balakar has withdrawn into his stronghold, where he is holding Ohn'ahra. This is unacceptable!

Meanwhile, his Nokhud raiders storm across the plains wreaking havoc. While we engage them in battle, you could infiltrate the Nokhud stronghold and rescue Ohn'ahra. Will you do this for us?
ObjectivesText: Defeat Balakar Khan and rescue Ohn'ahra in The Nokhud Offensive.
RewardText: With this victory, you have helped the Maruuk more than you will ever know. Our most sincere thanks, $n. Go with the blessings of Ohn'ahra.
